channel.title: Sailing on Ross Hemsley
channel.description: Recent content in Sailing on Ross Hemsley

item.title: Restoring a Hanseatic 19.2
item.description: Post 1 - First Steps. In order to keep myself busy whilst locked down, I took on a project of restoring a rather dilapidated, though (in my opinion) charming, and pleasingly-proportioned keelboat. The boat was complete with both a mainsail and a jib and, despite being quite scruffy, actually was sailable. Despite this, the general condition of the boat was quite bad, and it was unlikely to deal well with strong gusts…
